programme.desc: Tara is feeling better than she has in a long time as her mural project progresses well and she makes a new friend, Tiffany - but Tiffany's curiosity about Tara's "alters" leads to a heartbreaking setback.(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: This sci-fi epic envisions a future world that has fallen into anarchy on the heels of an infertility defect in the population that has made humankind face the likelihood of its own extinction. Set against a backdrop of London torn apart by violence, the film follows one of the champions of Earth's survival: Theo (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen), a disillusioned ex-activist turned bureaucrat, who faces his own demons and must protect the planet's last remaining hope for a future generation.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.

programme.title: Mistrust
programme.desc: Happy, beautiful and independent, Veronica enjoys being a mistress. No commitment, no strings and she never has to be vulnerable. She has carefully laid every brick in the walls of the fortress surrounding her heart. She's safe and having a great time. However, there is one person who knew her heart before those walls were erected, her best friend Brandon, who has stood by her for too many years to count. And while Veronica has tried to keep her feelings at bay, he is the one who holds the key that opens her Pandora's box of emotions.

programme.title: The Big Chill
programme.desc: Seven college housemates from the 1960s who have drifted apart must now reunite for the funeral of a friend. Having entered adulthood as non-conformists, most now belong to the establishment. Harold (Kevin Kline) has grown up to be a running-shoe magnate; Michael (Jeff Goldblum), a gossip magazine journalist; Sam (Tom Berenger), TV's hottest private eye; and Nick (William Hurt), a drug dealer. Among the women, Sarah (Glenn Close) is a doctor; Meg (Mary Kay Place), a lawyer; and Karen (Jobeth Williams), a wife and mother in the suburbs.(n)

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Opposite Sex
programme.desc: This documentary picks up the respective stories of Rene and Jamie, 13 years after their Gender Affirmation Surgeries. The two subjects let us back into their very changed worlds and find that their surgeries, which had been lifelong goals, were far from the finish line of their journeys - in fact, they turned out to be only the beginning of more difficult, arduous and true lifelong experiences.(n)

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage.(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her.(n)

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy.(n)

programme.title: The Fantasticks
programme.desc: Joel Grey and Brad Sullivan are small-town fathers conspiring to bring their children together in a love match by pretending to discourage it in this magical musical costarring Barnard Hughes.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.(n)

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world.(n)

programme.title: Revolution
programme.desc: Tara turns into "T" and steals Tara's car, with Charmaine and Max in hot pursuit - leading Marshall to conclude it's the perfect time for him to throw a massive house party and get closer to his crush, Jason.(n)

programme.title: Transition
programme.desc: Tara and Charmaine's parents visit for the latter's birthday, but they have a secret agenda to take Tara and Max's kids to live with them.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: Autumn In New York
programme.desc: A wealthy, charismatic New York restaurateur (Richard Gere) falls for a much younger hat designer (Winona Ryder) but their relationship is complicated by his philandering ways, his past connection to her family, and her debilitating illness. Jill Hennessey, Anthony LaPaglia, Sherry Stringfield and Elaine Stritch costar in this romantic melodrama.(n)

programme.title: Whale Rider
programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Up Baby
programme.desc: Screwball comedy about a dog with a taste for dinosaur bones, a housebroken leopard named Baby, a madcap heiress who sets her cap for an absent-minded paleontologist, and a wacky menagerie of secondary characters. (cc).

programme.title: Desk Set
programme.desc: An efficiency expert shakes up a TV network's research department by installing a computer. (cc).

programme.title: Stage Door
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee is a portrait of aspiring actresses in a theatrical rooming house, among them are a debutante newcomer, her caustic roommate and a sweet actress who's literally starving. An adaptation of the Edna Ferber-George S. Kaufman play.

programme.title: Without Love
programme.desc: Two WWII scientists decide to marry—not out of love, but out of scientific interest. All is fine until an ex-girlfriend appears, and both parties discover that perhaps not all is as platonic as it seems.

programme.title: The Madwoman of Chaillot
programme.desc: A group of Parisian eccentrics rally to save their city from avaricious industrialists. Based on the stage play by Jean Giraudoux.

programme.title: The Sailor Takes a Wife
programme.desc: A couple get married after one night, but as they begin setting up house together, they realize that they don't know much about each other, and marriage might be harder than it seems.

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: A drifter falls for a devastating femme fatale and they murder her much older husband, the roadhouse owner who hired him. When the two are ultimately arrested, a slimy lawyer may be able to help them avoid jail.

programme.title: The Cockeyed Miracle
programme.desc: When a shipbuilder dies suddenly of a heart attack, he is summoned to heaven by the ghost of his father. However, he chooses to stick around on Earth to wrap up some unresolved issues and help his family.

programme.title: The Beginning or the End
programme.desc: A look at the dawn of the Atomic Age, from the the Manhattan Project to the bombing of Hiroshima in l945.

programme.title: Any Number Can Play
programme.desc: Clark Gable plays the owner of a casino who has a full share of personal and professional problems. Determined to get his wife and child back, he cleans up his act.

programme.title: Man in the Dark
programme.desc: A crook (Edmond O'Brien) agrees to a brain operation that results in amnesia. Audrey Totter. Lew Landers directed.

programme.title: The Sellout
programme.desc: A newspaper editor exposes a crooked sheriff, with dire consequences.

programme.title: The Set-Up
programme.desc: Exposé of corruption in the boxing world, centered on the story of an aging, “washed-up” prizefighter.

programme.title: Tension
programme.desc: Film-noir suspense tale about a timid, cuckolded pharmacist who undertakes a methodical plan to murder his wife's lover, but when someone beats him to it, the husband becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: High Wall
programme.desc: A World War II veteran suffering from a recurring brain injury teams with a woman psychiatrist to prove himself innocent of his wife's murder.

programme.title: Lady in the Lake
programme.desc: Subjective camera work allows the viewer to see this film-noir mystery transpire through the eyes of a private detective who finds murder while investigating the case of a missing woman. The script was adapted from the Raymond Chandler novel; and Robert Montgomery directed and stars as private eye Philip Marlowe.

programme.title: The Unsuspected
programme.desc: A popular radio-show host recites spooky murder mysteries on his program, and the homicides he presents contain intimate and excruciating details because he had committed the actual crimes in real life.

programme.title: Chubasco
programme.desc: A wayward youth chooses a stint on a fishing boat as an alternative to jail but refuses to give up on the woman he loves despite her father's interference.

programme.title: Ask Father
programme.desc: Silent comedy short stars Harold Lloyd as a young man trying to get permission to marry a man's daughter. Snub Pollard, Bebe Daniels.

programme.title: Never Weaken
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd comedy short in which he tries to help save his girlfriend's job as a chiropractor's secretary by drumming up business for the man. Later, Lloyd turns suicidal when he mistakenly believes she wants to dump him and marry another. Mildred Davis, Roy Brooks. Directed by Fred C. Newmeyer. Cowritten by Hal Roach and Sam Taylor.

programme.title: High and Dizzy
programme.desc: In this silent comedy, Harold Lloyd stars as a novice doctor lacking patients, but finding one, and a love interest, in a young woman with a sleepwalking problem that lands both her and an inebriated Lloyd, on a ledge high atop a building. The object of his affection is played by Lloyd's future wife, Mildred Davis. Lloyd's real-life brother, Gaylord Lloyd, costars.

programme.title: An Eastern Westerner
programme.desc: The father of a spoiled young New Yorker ships him out West to a ranch, where he hopes the lad will toughen up and learn a bit of responsibility. Once there, he squares off against a town bully and falls for a local belle.

programme.title: Among Those Present
programme.desc: This silent comedy stars Harold Lloyd as a coatroom checker who impersonates an English nobleman to help a social-climbing family impress their fellow swells. Mildred Davis (who would later become the real-life Mrs. Lloyd) costars as the family's attractive daughter who falls for Lloyd's bogus royal.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd stars as a babysitter who, with his young charge (Anna May Bilson) in tow, tries to dodge a train conductor because they haven't paid for tickets. Mary: Mildred Davis. Directed by Hal Roach. Also known as “The Baby Sitter.

programme.title: Why Worry?
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd plays a rich hypochondriac caught up in a revolution in this silent classic. Fred Newmeyer directed.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd stars in this silent comedy about a harassed middle-class husband. Jobyna Ralston, Josephine Crowell, Charles Stevenson. Directed by Sam Taylor and Fred Newmeyer.

programme.title: For Heaven's Sake
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd is a playboy redeemed by a mission woman in this silent classic.

programme.title: The Kid Brother
programme.desc: Melodrama mixes with humor in this silent film about a small-town lad involved with a showgirl and a hunt for stolen funds.

programme.title: Welcome Danger
programme.desc: The scientist son of the former San Francisco police chief takes over the job from his father and busts up a drug ring headed by a prominent citizen.

programme.title: Feet First
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd's stunts highlight this farce about the transoceanic misadventures of a shoe clerk. Mary: Barbara Kent. Tanner: Robert McWade. Mrs. Tanner: Lillian Leighton. Garson: Alec B. Francis. Ship's Officer: Noah Young. Directed by Clyde Bruckman.

programme.title: The Milky Way
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd in a farce about a timid milkman who becomes a prizefighter. Gabby: Adolphe Menjou. Ann: Verree Teasdale. Speed: William Gargan. Mrs. LeMoyne: Marjorie Gateson. Polly: Dorothy Wilson. Mae: Helen Mack. Austin: George Barbier. Spider: Lionel Stander. Willard: Charles Lane. Wonderful cast. Expert direction by Leo McCarey.

programme.title: Safety Last
programme.desc: Classic Harold Lloyd silent about a store clerk who organizes a publicity stunt in which his friend climbs the side of a tall building, but a confluence of events forces him to perform the dangerous act himself. Famous for the scene in which Lloyd hangs from the hands of a clock atop the building.(n)

programme.title: Girl Shy
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd stars as the bashful author of a book about wooing women, who, on the way to the big city to get it published, meets a young beauty and they fall for each other. But when his manuscript is turned down, he deems himself not worthy of her love, until he learns that she's about to marry another.(n)

programme.title: The Freshman
programme.desc: A bumbling not-so-big man on a college campus crashes through a collection of classic sight gags in this classic satire of college life.(n)

programme.title: Speedy
programme.desc: Harold Lloyd, in his last silent film, plays a young man trying to help his girlfriend's grandfather, who operates New York's last horse-drawn trolley, which underhanded railway magnates are trying to get their hands on. Baseball immortal Babe Ruth has a cameo.(n)

programme.title: Movie Crazy
programme.desc: Spoof of Hollywood, with comedian Harold Lloyd as a country bumpkin determined to become a film star. Constance Cummings. Mrs. Kitterman: Louise Closser Hale. Assistant Director: Eddie Featherstone. Vance: Kenneth Thomson. O'Brien: Spencer Charters. Fine cast. Clyde Bruckman directed.(n)

programme.title: The Cat's Paw
programme.desc: Political farce with Harold Lloyd as a mayoral candidate who upsets his town's politicians. Petunia: Una Merkel. Jake: George Barbier. Strozzi: Nat Pendleton. Dolores: Grace Bradley. Mayor Morgan: Alan Dinehart. McGee: Grant Mitchell. Wang: Fred Warren. Shigley: J. Farrell MacDonald. Red: James Donlan. Co-scripted by Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: The Cat and the Fiddle
programme.desc: A struggling composer's latest opera is threatened when the leading lady walks out, followed by the male lead. The composer must play the part himself, and he enlists the help of a female music student who is engaged to a wealthy philanderer. Soon the composer and the student fall in love.(n)

programme.title: The Firefly
programme.desc: A Spanish spy goes undercover as a singer in order to uncover Napoleon's plans to invade her homeland. A version of the Friml operetta.(n)

programme.title: The Merry Widow
programme.desc: A playboy prince from a small country is forced to court a wealthy widow in order to ensure that her money stays in their homeland.(n)

programme.title: Smilin' Through
programme.desc: The old romantic classic about a love that endured the years makes a fine vehicle for Jeanette MacDonald in her prime. John: Brian Aherne. Kenneth: Gene Raymond. Ellen: Frances Robinson. Owen: Ian Hunter. Willie: Patrick O'Moore. Charles: Eric Lonsdale.(n)

programme.title: San Francisco
programme.desc: Set around the devastating 1906 earthquake and fire, it's the tale of a a sinful gambling-hall owner, a saloon singer who dreams of the opera, and a priest who's trying to help them both stay on the straight and narrow.(n)

programme.title: Cairo
programme.desc: An American movie star is mistaken for a Nazi spy, and thwarts Axis espionage in North Africa with help from her maidservant and a reporter.(n)

programme.title: The Sun Comes Up
programme.desc: In her final film, Jeanette MacDonald shares the screen with canine star Lassie and plays a concert singer embittered by her young son's death.(n)

programme.title: Claws *
programme.desc: As Desna plans for a big day, she realizes she can play a two-faced #bossbitch better than the rest of them. Meanwhile, after getting a disturbing message from Marnie, a reeling Polly gets an unexpected visit. (cc).

programme.title: Claws
programme.desc: As Desna plans for a big day, she realizes she can play a two-faced #bossbitch better than the rest of them. Meanwhile, after getting a disturbing message from Marnie, a reeling Polly gets an unexpected visit. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Snoop Dogg Presents the Joker's Wild
programme.desc: Kelly Osbourne critiques runway fashions and Snoop performs on the cowbell. A history teacher and a twerking pop-culture junkie have to guess what Snoop just painted. The winner gets a chance to spin for $25,000. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Snoop Dogg Presents the Joker's Wild
programme.sub-title: Use Your Brain and Make It Rain
programme.desc: Michael Strahan shows us his hip hop moves, "Claws" star Karrueche Tran does the nails for the rich and famous, Method Man chews up the scenery, and Snoop drops some "pimpin' puzzles." A bodybuilding dancer and a blogging nerd spin the wheels for a chance at $25,000. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Step Up 2 The Streets
programme.desc: A streetwise Baltimore step dancer attends the Maryland School of the Arts to avoid being sent to live with her aunt in Texas by her guardian. She gets unexpected help from a hip-hop fan whose brother is the school's uptight director. (cc).

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: A hapless chap who doesn't have any male friends to serve as best man at his wedding meets a freewheeling fun-loving guy who just might fill the bill, but their chummy, male-bonding camaraderie just might impact his relationship with his bride-to-be. (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The series ends as Lupo and Bernard try to locate a blogger who threatened to blow up a school, but the teachers' union hampers the probe. Van Buren's personal issues become a public affair. Olympic star Lindsey Vonn appears as a union employee. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives try to find the killer of a wife and mother, who was murdered for her car. Fernando: Victor Sierra. Anna: Cyndi Cartagena. Mercer: George Martin. Mrs. Galvez: Divina Cook. Wrightman: Louise Sorel. Rankin: Lawrence Arancio. Judge Scarletti: Ted Kazanof. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a corpse is found in a building elevator, the detectives start their investigation with records that show on which floors the elevator had previously stopped. Joanne: Pamela Gray. Judge Parks: Jerry Adler. Gillum: Gerry Bamman. Larry: Billy Gillespie. Ross: Carey Lowell. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: A divorced couple rediscover their passion for one another after their son's college graduation and must deal with the complications posed by their current love interests. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, ten strangers are stranded at an isolated motel in the Nevada desert, only to learn each of them has a secret, and that their arrival at the motel has not been a matter of mere chance. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: After a man dies in a shooting incident, his wife files a lawsuit against the company that manufactured the gun.The firearm manufacturer, taking no chances on the outcome of a potentially devastating case, hires a jury consultant who tries to guarantee a positive result for his clients. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Door in the Floor
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges and Kim Basinger are superb in this powerful adaptation of John Irving's novel about a couple whose marriage is haunted by a tragedy in their past. Written and directed by Tod Williams. Jon Foster, Mimi Rogers, Bijou Phillips. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Austin Powers The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: The series' second entry sends Austin Powers, the international man of mystery, zipping back in time to 1969 with his new sidekick, Felicity Shagwell, where nefarious Dr. Evil has stolen his "mojo," the life force that makes him a swinging ladies' man. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Man on the Moon
programme.desc: Milos Forman ("One Flew over the Cuckoo's Nest") directed this biography about the zany life and times of actor-comedian Andy Kaufman. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Three female office workers become friends and get revenge against their boss, a sexist egotistical lying hypocritical bigot, and in so doing create a more efficient and pleasant work environment. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: A divorced couple rediscover their passion for one another after their son's college graduation and must deal with the complications posed by their current love interests. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Two rival corporate spies and former government employees begin a clandestine love affair as they try to outwit and double-cross each other. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Evita
programme.desc: Madonna gives a fine performance in this adaptation of the Andrew Lloyd Webber-Tim Rice musical based on the life of Eva Peron (1919-52), the popular and beloved wife of Argentine president Juan Peron. Antonio Banderas. Juan Peron: Jonathan Pryce. Alan Parker directed. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Robert Altman's ensemble drama about a dancer (Neve Campbell) trying to make her way to the top of a Chicago ballet troupe. Engrossing story, dazzling choreography. Malcolm McDowell. Campbell, who was once a dancer, approached Altman with the story idea. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Top Ten Monks
programme.desc: A profile of the Cistercian monks at the Stift Heiligenkreuz Abbey, a 12th-century monastery near Vienna, who became a worldwide musical sensation after releasing a chart-topping album of Gregorian chant in 2008. Produced and directed by Dana Heinz Perry ("Boy Interrupted"). (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mr. Mom
programme.desc: A laid-off auto engineer runs the household while his wife takes the role of breadwinner, and he ends up playing poker with the neighborhood housewives and considering infidelity with a dedicated homewrecker. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: In the Land of Women
programme.desc: A jilted L.A. screenwriter visits his sick grandmother in Michigan and gets involved with an attractive neighbor and her daughter. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: Guitar-playing troubadours from New Zealand try to kickstart their careers in New York City. First up: Jemaine meets a woman at a party who happens to be Bret's old girlfriend. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: After realizing that they can't possibly afford the tuition for their daughter's college, a married couple team up with their eccentric neighbor to make money by running an illegal casino in the suburbs. Needless to say, things quickly spiral out of control as they deal with unruly guests while trying to keep their operation hidden from the police. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: This sports-history saga is the fact-based tale of the Texas Western squad that won the 1966 NCAA basketball championship—the first team to do so starting an all-black lineup. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Dolores Claiborne
programme.desc: A big-city journalist discovers a terrible secret about her family's past after her estranged mother becomes the prime suspect in the death of the elderly woman for whom she had been caring. Soon the daughter learns the details of her father's mysterious death years before, and eventually she realizes how profoundly she misunderstood her mother. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: This musical drama chronicles the rise and fall of Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons, one of the key pop groups of the early '60s, responsible for such iconic hits as "Sherry," "Walk Like a Man" and "Big Girls Don't Cry." (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Two young boys execute the "perfect" murder, even pinning it on a local crook, but a detective with a disturbed past will not be outsmarted. The boys lie about knowing each other and cover their tracks, but a lack of trust could bring them down. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Segments include a one-on-one interview with Los Angeles Rams coach Sean McVay about his early success, a look at the world's best freedivers and a profile on Kansas City Chiefs lineman Laurent Duvernay-Tardif. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The House

Needless to say, things quickly spiral out of control as they deal with unruly guests while trying to keep their operation hidden from the police. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Yes Man
programme.desc: A perennial naysayer becomes a guy who just can't say "no" (and won't) after attending a self-help seminar that challenges him to say yes to everything for a year. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Tim wants to snag a big promotion at work, but to do so he must take an eccentric nutcase to his boss's dinner party, where guests are supposed to bring the strangest person they can find. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: After losing his driver's license, a bumbling cop teams up with a brassy cabbie so he can pursue a team of female bank robbers who are led by a beautiful Brazilian. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Hand that Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: A widow poses as a nanny to seek revenge against a new mother, who does not know that their pasts are intertwined. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: June
programme.desc: An immigrant Chinese wife joins her husband in 1950s America after he graduates from college. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: A quarterback's soul is mistakenly sent to heaven after an accident, and his body is cremated. Before long, he's given a new body on Earth and sparks a relationship with an activist who's against his persona's bad practices. Based on the play by Harry Segall. Remake of "Here Comes Mr. Jordan." (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Adam
programme.desc: This character study stars Hugh Dancy as Adam, a man living with Asperger's syndrome, who does his best to reach out to his pretty new upstairs neighbor. As Adam attempts to gain control of his social skills, he discovers that with a little patience and understanding, developing a meaningful relationship might not be as hard as he previously thought. Peter Gallagher, Amy Irving, Rose Byrne. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Predator 2
programme.desc: An L.A. detective is swamped with cases of gruesome drug-dealer murders that appear to have no evidence at the scenes. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: A man who goes on the lam after he's wrongly convicted of killing his wife. As he scours the country looking for the true murderer, he is pursued be a relentless U.S. deputy marshal looking to bring him to justice. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: The Coen brothers' sly drama about a policewoman (Frances McDormand) who's trying to determine how several murders and a kidnapping are linked to an unassuming car salesman (William H. Macy). Showalter: Steve Buscemi. Grimsrud: Peter Stormare. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Kingsman The Golden Circle
programme.desc: Kingsman is faced with the challenge of operating with no home base after an evil corporation known as the Golden Circle destroys their headquarters. The elite group of spies must team up with an allied organization called Statesman to save the world. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
programme.desc: A struggling actor and crook moves to Los Angeles, hoping to score some movie roles, where he meets a gay PI at a party. When a series of female bodies turn up, they find themselves investigating the murders. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: O
programme.desc: Shakespeare's "Othello" inspired this drama about a black athlete who wins a scholarship to an all-white school. Although Odin's future seems bright, a jealous friend tries to make the star athlete believe that his girlfriend is cheating on him. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Happy Death Day
programme.desc: A college student is trapped in a time loop that forces her to keep reliving a birthday that ends with her murder at the hands of a masked madman. As she repeats the same day, she tries to figure out her killer's identity so she can avoid a grisly fate. (cc).

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: In the eighth installment of the "Fast and the Furious" series, Dominic Toretto's crew are rocked to their core when they must face their most-dangerous adversary yet: Dom himself, who is now working with a shadowy cyber-terrorist known only as Cipher. As DSS agent Luke Hobbs and the rest of the team attempt to fight back, they find themselves in an alliance with their old enemy, assassin Deckard Shaw. (cc).

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: Oliver Stone's docudrama about paralyzed Vietnam vet Ron Kovic, who tries to reconcile memories of his idealistic youth with his post-war disillusionment. (cc).

programme.title: Striptease
programme.desc: Dark comedy starring Demi Moore as a stripper struggling to gain custody of her daughter. Burt Reynolds. Al Garcia: Armand Assante. Shad: Ving Rhames. Darrell: Robert Patrick. Malcolm: Paul Guilfoyle. Orly: Jerry Grayson. Angela: Rumer Willis. (cc).

programme.title: The Final
programme.desc: Suicidal outcast Dane (Marc Donato) inherits a secluded lake house from his late uncle, and he and his misfit friends decide to strike back against their high-school tormentors by inviting them to a house party that no bully will leave unscathed. (cc).

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: A wily fox (voice of George Clooney) tries to outsmart three mean-spirited farmers and steal their chickens, but the feud eventually escalates into a battle between the farmers and a community of cunning animals. Other voices include Meryl Streep. Directed by Wes Anderson. (cc).

programme.title: Big Business

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider The Cradle of Life
programme.desc: The feisty video-game heroine goes against an evil scientist who specializes in biological weapons as they both race to find Pandora's Box. (cc).

programme.title: Sunshine
programme.desc: In the year 2057, a team of scientists sets out on a space voyage to reignite the dying sun. (cc).

programme.title: Addicted to Love
programme.desc: Jilted lovers team up to seek revenge against their exes---and end up falling for each other. (cc).

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Three groomsmen awaken after a night of debauchery to learn that the groom is missing, and they attempt to find him before the wedding bells chime. With no memory of the previous night's transgressions and precious little time to spare, the trio retrace their steps and discover where things went wrong. (cc).

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run regrets checking in at the Bates Motel, a lodge operated by a strange man with an unhealthy fixation on his mother. Remake of the Hitchcock classic. (cc).

programme.title: Firewall
programme.desc: This action thriller offers a high-tech twist on "The Desperate Hours" (1955, 1990). A bank-security expert must break into his own vault when robbers hold his family hostage and demand ransom. (cc).

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: A blacksmith joins the Crusades and tries to achieve peace between Muslims and Christians. Meanwhile, violent agitators on both sides foolishly strive to end the peace in a bid for greater power. (cc).

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An ex-CIA agent turns Paris upside down when his teenage daughter is abducted by members of a sex-trade gang. (cc).

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: During the French and Indian War, a European man raised Mohican rescues and escorts the daughters of a British colonel, on their way to their father at Fort Henry. (cc).

programme.title: John Wick Chapter 2
programme.desc: Hit man John Wick is once again called out of retirement, this time by a former colleague who wants him to repay a debt by killing an Italian crime lord. But when the assassination goes awry, Wick finds himself hunted by an international cabal of killers, and his only hope for survival might be a shadowy figure known as the Bowery King. (cc).

programme.title: 15 Minutes
programme.desc: A New York detective and an arson investigator go after a pair of Eastern European killers who manipulate the media. (cc).

programme.title: Taking Woodstock
programme.desc: Demetri Martin stars in this historical comedy-drama about the celebrated 1969 festival of peace and love. Martin plays Elliot Teichberg, an interior designer who offers to help out the promoters of Woodstock when they lose their permit to have the concert. He provides a space for the show, but must think on his feet when the entire event becomes much larger than he imagined. Directed by Ang Lee. Eugene Levy, Emile Hirsch, Liev Schreiber. (cc).

programme.title: In the Valley of Elah
programme.desc: Riveting fact-based drama about a Vietnam war veteran (Tommy Lee Jones) who goes on a quest to find his soldier son, who disappeared after returning stateside from a tour of duty in Iraq. Susan Sarandon, Charlize Theron. Written and directed by Paul Haggis. (cc).

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: In the eighth installment of the "Fast and the Furious" series, Dominic Toretto's crew are rocked to their core when they must face their most-dangerous adversary yet: Dom himself, who is now working with a shadowy cyber-terrorist known only as Cipher. programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A warrior named Conan seeks revenge on the man who killed his parents, but is tasked with helping save the daughter of a king who has come under the spell of the same man who Conan seeks to slaughter. (cc).

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: Suffering from writer's block, an unstable author is accused of plagiarism. (cc).

programme.title: Crimes and Misdemeanors
programme.desc: A married New York ophthalmologist tries to break up with his mistress, who threatens to tell his wife. Meanwhile, his mob-connected brother offers to "make the problem go away." (cc).

programme.title: Outcast

programme.title: Confidence

programme.desc: Martin and Gina go to dinner with their former love interests to prove there are no sparks left. Derrick: Joseph C. Phillips. Tanya: Angelle Brooks. Patrice: Vivica Fox. Carla: Dominique Jennings. Gina: Tisha Campbell. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Martin
programme.desc: To save a movie theater, Martin holds a benefit featuring black TV and movie actors from the 1970s. Cameos include Pam Grier, Ja'net DuBois, Dick Anthony Williams and Whitman Mayo. Martin Lawrence. Gina: Tisha Campbell. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Marlon (Marlon Wayans) is held hostage by a fan, and Shawn gets himself captured as well when he attempts a rescue. Shawn: Shawn Wayans. Pops: John Witherspoon. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Marlon (Marlon Wayans) joins a cult, thinking he's enrolled in an acting seminar. Mrs. Bliss: Kelly Coffield. Shawn: Shawn Wayans. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Marlon, Shawn and Pops discover the true meaning of giving when cousin Sheila (Kim Wayans) invites them to her farm for Christmas. Marlon: Marlon Wayans. Shawn: Shawn Wayans. Pops: John Witherspoon. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: When Shawn (Shawn Wayans) decides to marry an immigrant so she can be granted citizenship, the woman must live with him for six months, a move he soon comes to regret. Pops: John Witherspoon. Dee: Anna Maria Horsford. Famali: Jo Nell Kennedy. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Vanessa's parents have a fight and her father (Rasta) needs a place to stay, so he lands on the Kyles. He's an unusual houseguest, to put it mildly. Meanwhile, Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey) has cracked the lottery. Unfortunately, he must rely on Jr. to buy the ticket that he has calculated will win. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael has plans for a romantic getaway with Jay, but when Jr. foils that, they settle for a romantic evening at home. Hurdle No. 1: getting the kids out of the house. And that turns out to be the easy part. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael's so excited about a basketball game he's watching on TV that he accidentally tapes over Kady's first steps. What to do? Reenact them, with the reluctant assistance of Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey). Stevie: Taylor Negron. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: Keenen Ivory Wayans directed and Shawn and Marlon Wayans star in this raunchy spoof of teen horror films. It centers on a bumbling killer stalking clueless high-school students. Cindy: Anna Faris. Buffy: Shannon Elizabeth. Greg: Lochlyn Munro. Gail: Cheri Oteri.(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: A1 confronts Lyrica about Kimberly's allegations. A raging family feud threatens Ray J. and Princess' gender reveal party. Marcus blindsides Brooke with an unwelcoming surprise. Kimberly comes face-to-face with a ghost from her past. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Mayhem erupts at Kimberly's concert. A1 and Lyrica's marital issues ignite an all-out war between their moms. Ray J.'s meet-up with Safaree yields a shocking revelation. Brooke confronts a medical crisis. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Charmaine makes a power grab for Loyal Ink, dividing the crew even further. Don faces huge repercussions after getting arrested for a DUI. Dani and Terrence's relationship continues to heat up. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Charmaine establishes the "rules" as she continues as H.B.I.C., causing Lily and Reese to rebel. Ryan reveals a long-awaited Mother's Day surprise for Rachel. And Van has a big blow-up with Jenn. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Phor gets a second chance to pursue his dream. A family crisis brings Don and Ashley back together. Lily and Charmaine's fight reaches a fiery end. A male stripper bares all during the Loyal Ink Grand Opening. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Phor leaves it all behind in Chicago to finally pursue his music dreams in L.A. Ryan joins him with plans for a pop-up shop and rebuild the 9Mag brand. Cobra and Reese go head to head over Phor's booth and Ryan gets advice from a super celebrity client. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Dzień dobry

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A one-off special about Staggering Storytellers, taking a look at some of literature's greatest works and history's wackiest writers. Along the way the development of storytelling technology is observed, it is revealed how a party at Lord Byron's house led to the writing of the Gothic masterpiece Frankenstein, and how Charles Dickens was the Harry Styles of his day. Spanning 3,000 years of recorded history, the programme takes a look at the funny and ridiculous ways some of the finest writers cured their writing block.(n)
